meanings.definition: A long, loose-fitting robe worn by men in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: He wore a comfortable galabiyas to the market.
meanings.sent2: The man proudly donned his galabiyas for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The galabiyas made him look like a wise wizard.
meanings.sent4: His galabiyas flowed behind him like a river of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The colorful galabiyas caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A traditional garment worn in various countries in the Middle East and North Africa.
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate embroidery on the galabiyas.
meanings.sent2: During the festival, many people wore their beautiful galabiyas.
meanings.sent3: The galabiyas seemed to dance on its own in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The history of the galabiyas is woven into its fabric.
meanings.sent5: The scent of spices lingered on the old galabiyas.
